content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position(-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) which is currently working, processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position(40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) storing extracted coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) with no inventory.
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) waiting for source items.

### Iron Plate Storage
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (0.5, 0.5) containing iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) currently empty.

### Item Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) ready to transfer items from the chest at position (56.5, -83.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) containing iron plates.

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions, facilitating coal transport.
- Belts positioned at (x=50.5 y=-86.5) to (x=48.5 y=-86.5) and (x=49.5 y=-86.5) to (x=47.5 y=-86.5) with coal inventory.
- Additional belts at positions (x=43.5 y=-84.5) to (x=45.5 y=-84.5), (x=45.5 y=-85.5) to (x=47.5 y=-85.5), and (x=52.5 y=-83.5) to (x=52.5 y=-85.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that the crafting function is correctly implemented and does not attempt to concatenate a nil value. Double-check the crafting logic and error handling to prevent this issue.

### Errors when extracting items
- Make sure the target entity (e.g., chest) has enough items to extract. Verify the inventory before attempting extraction to avoid exceptions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
